message.content:
1. Preservation of health-related quality of life (HRQoL) is important during maintenance therapy.
2. The effect of olaparib on HRQoL was evaluated.
3. The evaluation was part of a Phase II trial.
4. The trial is identified as NCT00753545, Study 19.

messages.content:
Statement: Preservation of health-related quality of life (HRQoL) is important during maintenance therapy; we evaluated the effect of olaparib on HRQoL in this Phase II trial (NCT00753545, Study 19).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
